Posts.Content: njprovn wrote: Hi everyone, I am a 57 yr old woman & I've always been very diligent of having yrly mammos.  Well, I had a mammo about 3 wks ago & my gynocologist called me last Thursday & said she wanted more views of my right breast because a "suspicious" mass showed up that wasn't there last year! She said that it could very well be changes in my breast tissue but they just want to rule anything out.    I felt "faint" when she told me this & sick to my stomach.   I am a 3-time Open Heart Surgery survivor & I have to tell you, "I felt like the rug had been pulled out from underneath me!"   And, my husband & I are going on a cruise in 2 wks so I asked they doctor if I could make the appt for the tests when we come back.   She said, "not a problem -- go & have a wonderful time & then schedule things when you get back!"    So with that said, my appt is on June 9th for more views.   I know that it's out of my hands & that it doesn't do any good to worry but still.........  Thank you for listening!  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Need More View of Breast njprovn njprovn
